Funtion.Detail: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with any metal ion.
Interacting selectively and non-covalently with iron (Fe) ions.
Interacting selectively and non-covalently with oxygen (O2).
Enables the directed movement of oxygen into, out of or within a cell, or between cells.
Interacting selectively and non-covalently with heme, any compound of iron complexed in a porphyrin (tetrapyrrole) ring.

BioProcess.Detail: The directed movement of oxygen (O2) into, out of or within a cell, or between cells, by means of some agent such as a transporter or pore.

The directed movement of substances (such as macromolecules, small molecules, ions) into, out of or within a cell, or between cells, or within a multicellular organism by means of some agent such as a transporter or pore.
